website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with practical features and a stylish appeal, the Sperry Flex Deck CVO Ultralite illustrates the brand’s love for the outdoors. It’s suitable for different activities, especially casual use and water-based adventures, ideal for those looking for comfort.Some issues to keep in mind is that some of this model’s colorways may get dirty easily. The sole may also let in water from the wet ground or surface. At a budget-friendly price, these can be an excellent option from the Sperry Flex Deck series to treat one’s self to.
pros: Many reviewers have admired the Sperry Flex Deck CVO Ultralite as it’s a good-looking sneaker
According to a few users, the shoe doesn’t smell even when it gets wet or when the feet get sweaty
More than a handful of buyers attest that the model is ideal for both casual use and water activities
Several testers find it pleasing that the Sperry Flex Deck CVO Ultralite drains at the bottom and dries quickly
This version of the original Sperry Flex Deck CVO comes at a budget-friendly price
A lot of wearers acclaim the sneaker for being comfortable for a wide range of activities
Some commenters like that they can wear the Sperry Flex Deck CVO Ultralite without socks in hot weather
The shoe provides excellent grip on both boat and land surfaces, a few reviewers have praised
cons: A couple of buyers have complained that the white midsole of some of the colorways of the Sperry Flex Deck CVO Ultralite gets dirty quickly
The drainage through the sole lets water in when the deck or ground is wet, some testers have detected

customer_reviews.title: Classy beach shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. They look great and are comfortable. I can feel the cool air flowing through. Only thing is it is narrow and tight to put on, but its a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: David Gabriel  Caceres

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but hard to put on and rather tight.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and the ability to drain water quickly. The only problem is they are hard to put on and too tight around the top of my foot at this point, feet swelled the first time I wore these shoes. I am going to try and stretch them a bit to see if the become more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Largo

customer_reviews.title: Best boat shoes period.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, don’t slip, and I don’t need to wear socks. Recommend them to everyone now. I need to order a bunch before they discontinue them. I feel like the world does that with everything good.
customer_reviews.author: Fair guy

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product,very light and comfortable. Very fast shipping and great price. Bought different colors for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: JC Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these deck shoes for a boat trip and I'm glad I did! They are easy to slip on, dry quickly after a day on the water, and are very comfortable. My feet are a touch on the wider side and usually run into issues with narrow shoes. These were the perfect fit and after 6 weeks of wear, continue to be comfortable on land and on boat. Excellent purchase and would purchase anther pair!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale and they are great product. They are a smidge snug at first, but my husband has worn them three or four times now and says they loosen up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Arcangeli

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these! Bought for a trip to Costa Rica, now he wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleS

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people with sweaty feet looking for a shoe that will allow their feet to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product...what happened to the Sperrybrand?
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable that Sperry would put their name on this cheap product. Started falling apart at the seams after one day. Also have a funky fit that makes your feet sit angled in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, long and narrow.  ;)
customer_reviews.text: They are too long and too narrow. They were cheap, so I didn’t send them back. They work OK with no socks.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. Soft sole, wears out pretty quick on hard surface walking. Designed for sand or boat use. Very stylish looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Navy Blue will stain your feet
customer_reviews.text: Dyed my feet blue after purchasing 2 days ago (not on Amazon). They fit a little tight at first but after wearing them a couple of days they stretched to fit perfect. I not too happy that I paid approximately $90 and the color stained my feet. Did they really expect them NOT to get wet?
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No sock shoe with awesome ventilation and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is awesome. My husband brought a pair of these shoes because he hates wearing socks in shoes during the summer. These shoes are light comfortable, unique and multi-textured for a modern casual sneaker. The cool part is that the insole doesn't hold onto odors for many reasons. My husband describes the shoe as breathable on top of the foot, side and even feels as if there is ventilation under the footed of the shoe to release heat.
customer_reviews.author: L Fultz

product_meta.title: Sperry mens Flex Deck Cvo Ultralite
feature_bullets: Molded Hydro Grip outsole pods with Adaptive Wave-Siping attached to mono mesh for unsurpassed drainage and breathability
Perforated EVA heel-midsole-footbed combo delivers superior underfoot comfort and drainage with zero water absorption
Minimal, hydrophobic upper materials allows for minimal water absorption and quick drying
Adjustable bungee lace with toggle creates a dynamic and versatile fit
